meanings.definition: In a manner that is not customary or usual.
meanings.sent1: She unwontedly wore mismatched socks to the formal event.
meanings.sent2: The cat unwontedly decided to swim in the pool.
meanings.sent3: The penguin unwontedly tried to fly with the seagulls.
meanings.sent4: The flowers bloomed unwontedly early this year.
meanings.sent5: The teacher unwontedly canceled the test at the last minute.

meanings.definition: In a way that is out of the ordinary or unexpected.
meanings.sent1: He unwontedly burst into song during the meeting.
meanings.sent2: The magician unwontedly pulled a rabbit out of his hat.
meanings.sent3: The clown unwontedly juggled with water balloons.
meanings.sent4: The sun unwontedly appeared on a rainy day.
meanings.sent5: The alarm clock unwontedly went off in the middle of the night.
